virtual-sensor.name: Thur_pos6_DozerDutyCycle__chart1
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer duty cycle information from Thur deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, PAYLOAD_PERIOD, PAYLOAD_MCUACTIVE, PAYLOAD_RADIOTX, PAYLOAD_RADIORX from Thur_Dozer_StateCounter__mapped__1950

source.query: select timed, GENERATION_TIME, CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_MCUACTIVE = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_MCUACTIVE * 1000 / PAYLOAD_PERIOD) as MCUACTIVE, CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_RADIOTX = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_RADIOTX * 1000 / PAYLOAD_PERIOD) as RADIOTX, CASEWHEN(PAYLOAD_RADIORX = 0, NULL, PAYLOAD_RADIORX * 1000 / PAYLOAD_PERIOD) as RADIORX from wrapper where POSITION = 6 and GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
